week_summary: The initial design draft of the A/B Test module has been completed and passed internal review.

Participated in the second phase launch meeting of the 'Starry Sky' project, confirming the goal of increasing user activity by 10% and the launch plan for December 18th. (Based on core decision M-20251112-001)
next_week_plan: Follow up on the progress of Li Ming's technical implementation plan (expected to be completed next Friday).
Liaise with Wang Fang to assist in confirming the marketing budget.
coordination_needed: R&D Li Ming said manpower is slightly tight, and it may be necessary to coordinate a part-time front-end engineer to ensure on-time delivery of the A/B Test module.
